abstract: This case concerned an attempt by a man to recover from his former lover payments and gifts made to her while they were in a romantic relationship. Notwithstanding that the main battle was chiefly fought within the realm of evidence, the case raised interesting legal issues of property law that merit closer attention.
title: The Recoverability of Romantic Gifts: Kua Tee Beng v Ye Caiyan [2015] SGHC 53
subject: law
